name: Piece It!
description:
A casual jigsaw puzzle experience! Listen to awesome background music and enjoy the relaxing view and sounds of nature at the end of each puzzle!

- 40 high-quality puzzles
- 3 levels of difficulty
- snap sensitivity feature
- rotate by right-clicking
- awesome background music as you work on the puzzles
- relaxing sound of nature at the end of each puzzle
- achievements for the achievement hunters!
